item.title: I am the ultimate performative male (kinda)
item.description: The performative male is a con artist, a tasteless impersonator that listens to Clairo, a chameleon if it was shit at its job because they are easy to spot. I call them tasteless not because their interests are bad (Clairo is actually good) but because they didn’t earn their interests; they are just copying what they see online consciously or subconsciously. I personally think this is just the response of some people to the red pill movement — it’s just the other side of the same coin.
